heading: HR01049
0: A RESOLUTION TO INCLUDE IN THE PROPOSED GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT OF 2018 A PROVISION THAT STATES "SAVINGS GENERATED BY AN AGENCY REGIONAL OFFICE (ARO) SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE SAME INSTEAD OF REVERTING IT BACK TO ITS CENTRAL OFFICE (CO) FOR POOLING AND REPROGRAMMING" AND OTHER AMENDMENTS

II; PANCHO, GAVINI "APOL" C.; ROBES, FLORIDA "RIDA" P.; SUANSING, ESTRELLITA B.; SY-ALVARADO, JOSE ANTONIO "KUYA JONATHAN" R.; TUGNA, SHERWIN N.; VERGARA, ROSANNA "RIA" V.; VIOLAGO, MICAELA S.; YAP, VICTOR A.; NIETO, JOHN MARVIN "YUL SERVO" C.;
